      • load

        public void load(String joinFileName,
        InputStream weightStream,
        String precompiledCostFileName,
        float wSignal)
          throws IOException,
                 MaryConfigurationException
        Load weights and values from the given file
        Specified by:
        load in interface JoinCostFunction
        Parameters:
        joinFileName - the file from which to read default weights and join cost features
        weightStream - an optional file from which to read weights, taking precedence over
        precompiledCostFileName - an optional file containing precompiled join costs
        wSignal - Relative weight of the signal-based join costs relative to the phonetic join costs computed from the target
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException
        MaryConfigurationException - MaryConfigurationException

      • readJoinCostWeightsFile

        public static Object[] readJoinCostWeightsFile(String fileName)
                                        throws IOException,
                                               FileNotFoundException
        Read the join cost weight specifications from the given file. The weights will be normalized such that they sum to one.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the text file containing the join weights
        Returns:
        readJoinCostWeightsStream(new FileInputStream(fileName))
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException
        FileNotFoundException - FileNotFoundException

      • cost

        public double cost(int u1,
          int u2)
        Deliver the join cost between two units described by their index.
        Parameters:
        u1 - the left unit
        u2 - the right unit
        Returns:
        the cost of joining the right Join Cost features of the left unit with the left Join Cost Features of the right unit.

      • cost

        public double cost(Target t1,
          Unit u1,
          Target t2,
          Unit u2)
        A combined cost computation, as a weighted sum of the signal-based cost (computed from the units) and the phonetics-based cost (computed from the targets).
        Specified by:
        cost in interface JoinCostFunction
        Parameters:
        t1 - The left target.
        u1 - The left unit.
        t2 - The right target.
        u2 - The right unit.
        Returns:
        the cost of joining the left unit with the right unit, as a non-negative value.

      • cost

        protected double cost(Target t1,
          Target t2)
        Deprecated. 
        A phonetic join cost, computed solely from the target.
        Parameters:
        t1 - the left target
        t2 - the right target
        Returns:
        a non-negative join cost, usually between 0 (best) and 1 (worst).
